i take pride in getting straight as.

content.text: Hi there, what are you up to today?
Hello! I'm doing well, just hanging out with my daughter.
That sounds fun! I'm a single dad too, I know how important it is to spend time with your kids.
It's definitely the most important thing in my life. What's your daughter's name?
Her name is Ashley. She's five years old and she's the light of my life.
That's a beautiful name. I'm sure she's a handful, but I'm sure she's also a joy to have around.
You're right, she can be a handful sometimes, but she's always so happy and loving.
Sounds like you're doing a great job raising her.
Thank you, I appreciate that. It's not always easy, but it's worth it.
I'm sure it is. My daughter is the best thing that's ever happened to me.
I know what you mean. Ashley is my everything.
It's nice to meet another single dad. It can be lonely sometimes, but it's also nice to know that we're not alone.
I agree. It's nice to talk to someone who understands what it's like.
